Essence of wind is famous for its wondrous purification powers. Why, it's only possible to rely on the village's oasis for our drinking water because there is essence of wind at the bottom of that very oasis.

It is an invaluable resource that allows us to sustain life.

If you happen to have some, I will pay you very handsomely for it.

Oh, you got it! Thank you!

People who rely on the oasis water will appreciate you for this, .
If you get me some essence of wind to maintain the clear oasis, it would be greatly appreciated.
